meanings.definition: Stylish or elegant in a showy way
meanings.sent1: The party had the swankiest decorations I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: She always wears the swankiest clothes to special events.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was the swankiest in the neighborhood with its shiny collar.
meanings.sent4: The swankiest car on the street turned heads wherever it went.
meanings.sent5: The hotel room was the swankiest I had ever stayed in, with its plush furnishings and golden accents.

meanings.sent1: Their wedding was held at the swankiest venue in town.
meanings.sent2: The swankiest hotel in the city offers top-notch service to its guests.
meanings.sent3: The penguin strutted around the icy terrain like the swankiest bird in the flock.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the swankiest accessory she wore, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The swankiest yacht in the harbor gleamed under the sun, a symbol of wealth and opulence.
